mapper.select: SELECT wl.*, su.realname AS succeedName, sur.realname AS submitName, sur.org_name AS submitOrgName, sur.avatar AS avatar FROM t_work_log wl LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON wl.succeed_id = su.id LEFT JOIN sys_user sur ON wl.submit_id = sur.id WHERE wl.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_work_log SET confirm_status = '1' WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE t_work_log SET check_status = '1' WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT wl.id AS id, wl.submit_time AS time, su.realname AS successName FROM t_work_log wl LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON wl.succeed_id = su.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND wl.succeed_id LIKE concat( '%', #{param.userId}, '%' )
AND wl.submit_time >= #{param.startTime} and wl.submit_time < #{param.endTime}
AND wl.check_status = 0 ORDER BY wl.create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_work_log SET del_flag = '1' WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS submitNum, wl.submit_id AS submitId, su.realname AS submitName, su.org_name AS department FROM t_work_log wl LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = wl.submit_id WHERE wl.del_flag = 0
AND wl.submit_time >= #{param.dayStart} AND wl.submit_time <= #{param.dayEnd}
AND su.realname LIKE concat( '%', #{param.submitName}, '%' )
GROUP BY wl.submit_id
